name: 張玉鈍
objective:
本課程首先探討競爭優勢階段、經營模式之關連如何豐富化顧客價值。進而探討實現精實企業體的方向及議題，包括理念、流程、員工與事業夥伴、解決問題之學習型組織，實踐精實之基本步驟與分析工具如價值溪流圖(value stream mapping) 服務業價值溪流圖，及變革到精實的準則。
In this course, we first cover the linkages between competitive advantages and business models to alleviate customer value. Topics and issues to realized lean enterprise will be covered, such as 4 P framework (the philosophy, processes, partners and problem solving) leading to learning organization, steps and analysis tools to implement lean, and the guideline to transform to lean.
